author: Simon Difford
description: This combination of bittersweet liqueur, cachaça and sherry is polarising. I like it! I created it; but I can see that many, perhaps the majority, will hate it. Bet they don't like Marmite either. Poor souls!
name: Señor Santoni

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
